description.narrative: IFC is considering supporting Proyectos Educativos Integrales del Peru S.A.C. (PEIP or the Company), a company operating in the Peruvian education sector. The proceeds of the investment will be used to support PEIPs expansion plans in the sector, which include expansion plans across all market segments: technical training, university education and K-12 schools.

The project is expected to (i) expand access and quality of education to students in K-12 and tertiary level; (ii) provide employment opportunities for local teachers and skilled administrative professionals; and (iii) set new local standards, by demonstrating the viability for privately run education institutions to provide good quality education and employability

participating-org.narrative: PROYECTOS EDUCATIVOS INTEGRALES DEL PERU S.A.C.

mailing-address.narrative: Grupo El Comercio Jr. Antonio Miro Quesada 300 Lima Peru Telephone: (51-1) 426-4676

name.narrative: The Companys operations and headquarters are located in Lima, Peru. The Project could be developed throughout the country.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.

sector.narrative: T-AB - Colleges, Universities, and Professional Schools
